mapper.insert: insert into loan_check (LC_NUM, LC_STATE, MEM_CODE, LP_NUM) values(loan_check_seq.nextVal,'선정대기',#{mem_code},#{lp_num})
mapper.select: select la.lc_num lc_num,la.la_hamount la_hamount,la.la_startdate la_startdate, to_char(la.la_sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') la_sysdate, lc.lc_num lc_num,lc.lc_state lc_state, lc.mem_code mem_code, lp.lp_num lp_num,lp.lp_name lp_name, lr.lr_amount lr_amount,lr.lr_balance lr_balance, lr.lr_reaccount lr_reaccount, to_char(lr.lr_startdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') lr_startdate from loan_application la, loan_check lc,loan_product lp,loan_repay lr where la.lc_num=lc.lc_num and lp.lp_num=lc.lp_num and lc.lc_num=lr.lc_num(+) and lc.mem_code=#{mem_code}

select la.lc_num lc_num,la.la_hamount la_hamount,la.la_startdate la_startdate,la.la_livingterm la_livingterm,la.la_repayterm la_repayterm, la.lr_type lr_type, to_char(la.la_sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') la_sysdate, lc.lc_num lc_num,lc.lc_state lc_state, lc.mem_code mem_code, lc.hd_code hd_code,lc.lp_num lp_num, lp.lp_num lp_num,lp.lp_name lp_name,lp.lp_interestrate lp_interestrate,lp.lp_cancelfee lp_cancelfee,lp.lp_maximum, lr.lr_amount lr_amount,lr.lr_balance lr_balance, lr.lr_interest lr_interest, lr.lr_repaydate lr_repaydate, lr.lr_firstdate lr_firstdate, lr.lr_reaccount lr_reaccount, to_char(lr.lr_startdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') lr_startdate from loan_application la, loan_check lc,loan_product lp,loan_repay lr where la.lc_num=lc.lc_num and lp.lp_num=lc.lp_num and lc.lc_num=lr.lc_num(+) and lc.mem_code=#{mem_code} and lc.lc_num=#{lc_num}
mapper.update: update loan_check set lc_state = '서류제출완료' where lc_num = #{lc_num}
update loan_check set lc_state = '실행완료' where lc_num = #{lc_num}
update loan_repay set lr_balance = lr_balance - #{lr_balance} where lc_num =#{lc_num}
